item.title: Mentioned by iPolitics.ca (subscription)
item.description:
OFFICIAL CIRCLES: Will there be shuttles to the All-Party Party?
It's nice to see that despite what rancour may come in Question Period, the All-Party Party is still alive and well in 2011. It's a tradition worthy of preserving. MPs Élaine Michaud and Marie - Claude Morin.

item.title: Mentioned by Montreal Gazette
item.description:
NDP surge takes toll on Tory bastion
